trans-unit.source: Represents the set of glyphs that are used for rendering fixed text.
trans-unit.target: 代表用於呈現固定的文字的圖像 （glyph） 集合。

trans-unit.source: The Glyphs element represents the output of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun> in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 圖像 （glyph） 項目代表的輸出<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun>中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。</xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun>

trans-unit.source: The following markup syntax is used to describe the Glyphs element.
trans-unit.target: 下列標記的語法用來描述圖像 （glyph） 項目。

trans-unit.source: [!code-xml[GlyphsOvwSamp1#1](~/add/codesnippet/xaml/t-system.windows.documen_7_1.xaml)] [!code-xml[GlyphsOvwSamp1#1](~/add/codesnippet/xaml/t-system.windows.documen_7_1.xaml)] Each glyph defines metrics that specify how it aligns with other Glyphs.
trans-unit.target: [!code-xml[GlyphsOvwSamp1](~/add/codesnippet/xaml/t-system.windows.documen_7_1.xaml)][!code-xml[GlyphsOvwSamp1](~/add/codesnippet/xaml/t-system.windows.documen_7_1.xaml) ]每個字符定義指定如何使其與對齊其他圖像的度量資訊。

trans-unit.source: The following graphic defines the various typographic qualities of two different glyph characters.
trans-unit.target: 下圖會定義兩個不同的字符字元的各種印刷品質。

trans-unit.source: ![Diagraph of glyph measurements](~/add/media/glyph-example.png "Diagraph of glyph measurements") Various typographic qualities of two different glyph characters
trans-unit.target: ![圖像度量作圖器](~/add/media/glyph-example.png "圖像度量作圖器")兩個不同的字符字元各種印刷品質

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Glyphs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Glyphs"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the bidirectional nesting level of <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Glyphs"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定雙向巢狀層級的<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Glyphs"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|, |
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|、 |

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> value that represents the bidirectional nesting level.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Int32>值，表示雙向的巢狀層級。</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Glyphs.BidiLevel*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Glyphs.BidiLevel*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Glyphs.BidiLevel*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the caret stops that correspond to the code points in the Unicode string representing the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Glyphs"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定表示您建立的 Unicode 字串中的字碼指標對應的插入號停駐點<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Glyphs"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The return value is a string of hexadecimal digits that describe an array of <xref:System.Boolean> values that correspond to every code point in the value represented by the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Glyphs.UnicodeString%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值是描述陣列的十六進位數字的字串<xref:System.Boolean>值對應至每個程式碼所代表的值點<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Glyphs.UnicodeString%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Glyphs.UnicodeString%2A> </xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`||

trans-unit.source: A value of type <xref:System.String> that represents whether the code points have caret stops.
trans-unit.target: 型別的值<xref:System.String>代表的程式碼點都具有插入號停駐點。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Glyphs.CaretStops*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Glyphs.CaretStops*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Glyphs.CaretStops*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the specific device font for which the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Glyphs"></xref> object has been optimized.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定其特定裝置字型<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Glyphs"></xref>物件已經過最佳化。

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Glyphs> is rendered on a device that has built-in support for the named device font, the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Glyphs> should be rendered using a device specific mechanism for selecting that font, and by sending Unicode code points rather than glyph indices.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Glyphs>呈現具有指定的裝置字型，內建支援的裝置上<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Glyphs>應該使用裝置特定的機制，來選取字型，並將它的 Unicode 字碼指標，而不是圖像索引來呈現。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Glyphs> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.Glyphs>

trans-unit.source: When rendering onto a device that does not include built-in support for the named device font, DeviceFontName should be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 當轉譯到不包含具名的裝置字型的內建支援的裝置時，應該忽略 DeviceFontName。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`||

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> value that represents the name of the device font.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>值，表示裝置字型的名稱。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Glyphs.DeviceFontName*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Glyphs.DeviceFontName*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Glyphs.DeviceFontName*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用於轉譯的 em 大小<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Glyphs"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Double>值，表示用於轉譯的 em 大小。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref:System.Uri>代表用於呈現字型的位置<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Glyphs"></xref>類別</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|, |

trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Uri>代表用於呈現字型的位置<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Glyphs"></xref>類別</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Glyphs.FontUri*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Glyphs.FontUri*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Glyphs.FontUri*>

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a collection of glyph specifications that represents the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Glyphs"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定表示圖像 （glyph） 規格的集合<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Glyphs"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: A sequence of glyphs forms a single cluster.
trans-unit.target: 一連串的圖像 （glyph） 會形成單一叢集。

trans-unit.source: The specification of the first glyph in the cluster is preceded by a specification of how many glyphs and how many code points combine to form the cluster.
trans-unit.target: 在叢集中的第一個字符的規格是前方會有多少圖像 （glyph） 的規格而結合以形成叢集的多少字碼指標。

trans-unit.source: The Indices property collects in one string the following properties.
trans-unit.target: 索引屬性收集在一個字串中的下列屬性。

trans-unit.source: - Glyph indices - Glyph advance widths - Combining glyph attachment vectors - Cluster mapping from code points to glyphs - Glyph flags Each glyph specification has the following form.
trans-unit.target: -圖像索引的字符寬度-前進結合圖像附加向量-從對應字碼指標到圖像 （glyph）-圖像 （glyph） 旗標的叢集之每個字符規格具有下列格式。

trans-unit.source: `[GlyphIndex][,[Advance][,[uOffset][,[vOffset][,[Flags]]]]]` ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|, |
trans-unit.target: `[GlyphIndex][,[Advance][,[uOffset][,[vOffset][,[Flags]]]]]` # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|、 |

trans-unit.source: A collection of glyph specifications that represents the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Glyphs"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 字符規格的集合，代表<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Glyphs"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Glyphs.Indices*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Glyphs.Indices*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Glyphs.Indices*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether to rotate the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Glyphs"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 決定是否要旋轉<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Glyphs"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the glyphs that make up the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Glyphs"></xref> object are rotated 90° counter-clockwise; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果圖像 （glyph） 組成<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Glyphs"></xref>物件會旋轉 90 ° 逆時針方向，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Glyphs.IsSideways*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Glyphs.IsSideways*>

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext.BaseUri%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext.BaseUri%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Glyphs> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它可用時，才<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Glyphs>執行個體轉換成<xref:System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext>介面。</xref:System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.Glyphs>
